Text: Thanks STF, do you have any Army of Two comics? Also where do you find most of your downloads if you don't mind me asking. Looking to help out our community here.

you're both welcome.

the past 2 weeks, i've been getting a lot of the new releases (and some older stuff) from the comics board at bolt.cd

other sources:

h33t dot com
i-s-o-h-u-n-t dot com (you'll have to take out the dashes, TPB really doesn't like them!)
